name: LRE Retrieval Processor
description: Retrieves a list of Learning Resource Exchange (LRE) metadata and paradata records based on their identifiers.

parameters.name: identifiers
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of the identifiers of the records to retrieve

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format in which records must be returned.

parameters.name: head
parameters.description: only returns the first record of the result list (as a JSON object).
